page.title: 17Recreation in Shepley.
page.content: The village of Shepley has a number of outdoor sporting facilities.There is an active cricket club situated just off of Marsh Lane.There is also a tennis club with two hard courts,which are used all year round.It has its own clubhouse. Next to the tennis club is a bowling club situated in a very sheltered hollow with a very pleasant pavilion. Shepley also has a Sunday football team who play on the main recreation field close to the school.They have recently acquired their own changing room facilities. Unique perhaps to the village is a croquet club with two greens and a very little clubhouse.
